text: Egha Josua gumazamizibav gɨa ghaze, “Ia gan, e uan Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim gɨnɨghnɨghsɨ, ia zurara dagɨar asaraghav itir kamɨn gan. Ikiavɨra Itir God, e mɨkemezir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba, dagɨar kam, bar ada baregha gɨfa. A kagh ababanimɨn mɨn ikɨ nɨghnɨzim ia danɨngtɨ, ia uan Godɨn akaba batoghan kogham.”
